product_name: Natural High Spicy Thai Chicken - 2 Servings
long_description: Spicy Thai seasonings combine broccoli and spinach with noodles in peanut sauce. Entree can be made in the pouch by adding boing water. Contains no preservatives, artificial colors or additives. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._.
